needs: Rasheed seeks to improve pharmacy operations and patient outcomes by applying data-driven methods to reduce stockouts, increase adherence, and optimize inventory and counseling processes. They focus on measurable KPIs, scalability of solutions, and clear accountability while managing budgets effectively and operating within complex hospital environments in Nairobi.
personality: Rasheed communicates with transparency and directness, valuing data and clear documentation to align stakeholders and foster inclusion. They prefer iterative, small-scale experiments over debates and prioritize simplicity and humane processes. Their collaborative style is pragmatic, focused on outcomes, and they emphasize continuous learning, ownership, and methodical surfacing of unknowns early in projects.
